about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate Applied Computer Science student at Transilvania University in Brașov, with a strong desire to understand how technology and people can understand and develop each other. I am particularly attracted to UI, UX, Frontend, Angular, TypeScript and many other modern technologies. I love to create intuitive user interfaces and optimize user experience through developing innovative solutions.

travel-tales.title: Travel Tales
travel-tales.description: Modern Angular 19 web application for personal travel journal with intuitive interface and dual view display.

enjoy-cafe.title: Enjoy Café - Website
enjoy-cafe.description: Responsive Angular web application for "Enjoy Café" with modular architecture and shopping cart system.

calculator-wpf.title: Desktop Calculator
calculator-wpf.description: Desktop calculator application developed with WPF (.NET Framework) and MVVM principles.

ether-game.title: Ether - Strategic Game
ether-game.description: Strategic game for 2 players inspired by X and O and Connect 4, with extended rules and strategic elements.

online-library.title: Online Library
online-library.description: Online library project developed at university with Java, Spring Boot and web interface.

uni-e.title: Uni-e
uni-e.description: Project dedicated to future students to help them find the right university.

x0-genetic-algorithm.title: X&0 - Genetic Algorithm
x0-genetic-algorithm.description: University X&0 game project with genetic algorithm, developed by a team of 4 students.
